content.rendered:
Hosted PBX Services

Enhance the power of your business by high-end phone systems with Dialer360’s Hosted PBX.

Introduction

Hosted PBX Service (Private Branch Exchange) is a telephonic system within an enterprise that allows calls and extensions between employees. A conventional PBX system requires physical phones and a network of telephone lines integrated within the organization. This can take cost of communication to astronomical levels. However, with a Hosted PBX, you get the same feature over VoIP. Just like a telephonic system in any organization, you can have a cost-effective, digital version of the physical exchange hardware based PBX system that runs over VoIP instead and saves a ton of money and setting up time.

" Run a quality Hosted BPX service over VoIP… Purchasing and installing ancient PBX hardware is a thing of the past!"
Request a Demo

Trusted by over 12,000 business
and 18,000 users

Previous
Next
Key Features

Essential Features

User Friendly

Our Hosted PBX is simple and easy to use for end-users. No need for specialized training and skills. It’s as easy as installing a software and running it.

CRM Integration

Integrate your Hosted PBX to your own CRM to enhance its capabilities. Don’t have a CRM? Dialer360 also provides and optional CRM to go along your Hosted PBX backed by or 24/7 customer support.

No Missed Calls

Our hosted PBX ensures that all calls are routed without delay and your available business numbers are never busy.

IVR Attended Calls

Attend a call by an IVR that can direct calls to the concerned departments/extensions by taking the caller through step by step guidance to the correct extension.

Conference Call

Dialer360 Hosting PBX service also allows you to conduct conference calls. This feature connects your desired extensions to one call while ensuring a quality connection and clear voice.

Transfer Call

Transfer calls between departments seamlessly without worrying about disconnecting or losing an outside caller.

Single Click Recording

This feature allows you to keep track of all the calls to ensure security, quality of service and gather missed details.

Music On Call Hold

Play your corporate tone or audio mnemonics for the callers on hold to amplify you brand recall while delivering a pleasant experience.

CRM Integrations

Dialer360 can integrate with
your favorite CRM.

Reasons to choose Hosted PBX

Cost Efficient

Hosted PBX is super cost-effective than the hardware version. Not only does it save cost over the equipment but also removes installation cost from the equation.

Easy to Use

You can train your staff faster, with convenience with help from our direct customer support or simple tutorials provided to you by Dialer360 itself.

Display local ID

With Hosted PBX, you can also get the local caller ID of the location of your choice. This allows you to meet possible communication guidelines and customer engagement rules.

Quick Installation

Unlike a conventional PBX, you do not need to waste time in setting a network of wires or installing any equipment. The Hosted PBX literally takes minutes to setup by following the instructions provided by our support representative in real time.

Multiple Numbers

Need more than one number for your business? With our hosted PBX, you can get unlimited numbers to branch out your business contacts.

Get Calls on smartphones

The hosted PBX allows you to route your calls to your smartphone. Now stay available for your callers wherever you are.

Unlimited Users

A physical PBX restricts the number of users however; our hosted PBX gives you the advantage to have unlimited users.

Geographical Flexibility

The VoIP technology enables you to connect to your hosted PBX from all over the world. All you need is an internet, a smartphone or a laptop.

Awards

Award-winning customer service

Due to our innovative solution for call center organization, our company recognized as a leading company.
